name: Hester Bench - Flaxen Diamond Twill
description: Whether placed in a dining area, or used to create extra seating in a sitting room (or even hallway) the Hester Bench makes a comfortable place to hang out. Its foam filling offers a firm sit, as well as a supportive place to perch cups of tea, so it suits every scenario – from undertaking life admin to long chats with friends. It also looks great in repose, boasting a geometric strut made from solid oak, as well as versatile flaxen linen upholstery.
